tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE instrument_popularity (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    instrument_name VARCHAR(255),
    popularity_score INT,
    date_recorded DATE
)

CREATE TABLE instrument_popularity (
  popularity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  instrument_id INT,
  popularity_score INT,
  year_issued INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (instrument_id) REFERENCES instruments(instrument_id)
);
